name: I Demand Blood
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 43 (compo) - Theme: Sacrifices must be made

Taking the theme to the literal conclusion, you are a god who needs blood sacrifice to survive! LOTS of blood. Take matters into your own hands and drag your victims onto the altar before your time runs out.

Controls:
- Click and Drag 
- M to mute/unmute music

Your Sacrificial Lambs

Just an average person. There's loads of these. Does not refill your time, but is worth at least a few points.

A child. Rarer and a more valuable sacrifice. Worth more points and adds some time to the clock

A toddler. A very valuable sacrifice. Worth several points and adds more time to the clock than an older child does.
